scripts.build: tsc && cp -R lib/views dist && cp -R public dist/public
scripts.dev: cp -R lib/views dist && cp -R public dist/public && env-cmd -f ./config/.env ts-node-dev --inspect=0.0.0.0:9228 -- ./lib/server.ts
scripts.start: cp -R lib/views dist && cp -R public dist/public && env-cmd -f ./config/.env nodemon ./dist/server.js
scripts.prod: env-cmd -f ./config/.env npm run build && npm run start
scripts.test: cp -R lib/views dist && cp -R public dist/public && cp -R config dist && NODE_ENV=test mocha -r ts-node/register test/**/*.spec.ts
scripts.test-dev: cp -R lib/views dist && cp -R public dist/public && DEBUG=bajs NODE_ENV=tst nodemon --watch . --ext ts --exec "env-cmd -f ./config/.env  mocha -r ts-node/register test/**/*.spec.ts"
scripts.map-debug: tsc && cp -R lib/views dist && cp -R public dist/public && env-cmd -f ./config/.env nodemon --legacy-watch --watch ./dist --inspect=0.0.0.0:9229 --nolazy ./dist/server.js
